title: Jett: The Far Shore
description: Jett: The Far Shore (stylized as JETT: The Far Shore) is an upcoming action-adventure exploration video game developed and published by Superbrothers and Pine Scented Software. It will be Superbrothers' first game released since Superbrothers: Sword & Sworcery EP (2011). The game is set to be released on October 5, 2021 for Windows, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5.
